Values.SQL_MP_DB_CONNECTION_STRING: Connection string to the database containing market participants.
Values.SERVICE_BUS_CONNECTION_STRING: Connection string to the storage account for the integration events.
Values.SERVICE_BUS_HEALTH_CHECK_CONNECTION_STRI: Health connection string to the storage account for the integration events.
Values.SBT_INTEGRATION_EVENTS_NAME: The name of the topic where the integration events are published.
